skins.shipDescription: New Orleans class Heavy Cruiser― Minneapolis, hull number CA-36.
skins.selfIntroduction: From the Coral Sea to Guadalcanal, I have left my footprints everywhere in the Pacific theater. Although I had to pause my mission due to little annoyances... but considering the results, my battle record can be considered as outstanding!
skins.acquisition: Hey ya! New Orleans class Heavy Cruiser, reporting in! I excel at hunting. If you have any prey that you’d like to hunt, then leave it to me!
skins.login: You have very good spirit, are you ready for today’s hunt?
skins.details: Do you want to hear my hunting stories? Alright! But which one do I start with...
skins.secretaryIdle1: My war paint? Oh, I’m not the only one who does this… is this what you mean?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Torpedo? I’m not afraid of that, I was just unlucky that one time…
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey, don’t just sit there, come with me and let’s take a look around!
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you ready for the hunt?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ya! ...you, do you want to become my prey?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, why's that Quincy so happy to see me in this outfit? It's hard to move around in, and there's all this stuff flapping around that makes it hard to hunt. What do you think of this outfit?
skins.acquisition: Commander, why's that Quincy so happy to see me in this outfit? It's hard to move around in, and there's all this stuff flapping around that makes it hard to hunt. What do you think of this outfit?
skins.login: You wanna go on a hunt again, Commander? Or a sortie, that's fine too!
skins.details: Oww! Son of a...! Learning how to cook sucks! Can't believe Vincennes told me to do this when all she does is microwave her food... But I'll keep trying! Just for the Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle1: You serious?! Now that we're married, we're gonna be cleaning the office together?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll be here the whole day if you need me, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Anything I could help out with, Commander? Like, c'mon, we're wed and I'm your secretary. Put me to work doing more stuff if you want.
skins.secretaryTouch: Yeah? What is iC Huh?! S-seriously, I've told you not to randomly go "I love you" around me! I'm so embarrassed I could die!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: S-s-s-so this kinda thing's fine now, huh?

skins.JPClientName: ワイルドステュ`デント
skins.shipDescription: Textbooks, pencils and erasers... hey, must students always pay attention in class... Commander? Can you arrange for us to get more extracurricular activities?
skins.acquisition: Textbooks, pencils and erasers... hey, must students always pay attention in class... Commander? Can you arrange for us to get more extracurricular activities?
skins.login: Good morning Commander. Well, just wait for me to finish my burger and I’ll get started on today’s mission.
skins.details: I've been paying attention in class! See, here are the notes I took.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Coke, burgers and fries―― Yes, let’s get that for lunch today
skins.secretaryIdle2: Smartphone? Yes, Quincy gave this to me, although it doesn’t really work well…
skins.secretaryIdle3: Class is so boring, but its not good to skip... hmmm――
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you want to have some fries? I’ll share with you a little.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Th-this is against the school policy!

skins.shipDescription: Oh crap! Move outta the way, Commander! Come on, man, look out next time! You'd have gotten hurt if I'd slammed into you!
skins.acquisition: Oh crap! Move outta the way, Commander! Come on, man, look out next time! You'd have gotten hurt if I'd slammed into you!
skins.login: Hang on, don't move! All right, hahah. Managed to grind to a halt.
skins.details: Hey, Commander, make good use of your day off and give skateboarding a try. Hahah, let's start with something simple, all right? I'll keep a close eye on you, like I do when hunting prey.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Did a Meowfficer on a skateboard just swoosh past me...? Must've imagined it...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Nothing beats this feeling of being able to move freely and not bound by anything!
skins.secretaryTouch: Try and keep up if you can! Hahaha!

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas, Commander! Right now, I'm Santa Claus! And this guy over here is my partner in delivering presents! Right, this is a present for you. C'mon, go ahead and take it!
